topSection.text:
Actionable insights from research data.
Open, verifiable, privacy-preserving.

60,000+ clinical trials are initiated each year. Unfortunately, collected research data is often only used for the purpose of a single study. Sponsors are reluctant to exchange data, as scalable solutions for self-sovereign and privacy-preserving exchange are lacking.

Triall and partners are developing a federated data marketplace for the exchange of clinical trial data without sharing or exposing underlying data resources.

hero.header: This demo environment is aiming to bring the Gaia-X concepts and federation services to live in the context of the mobility sector. In the upcoming months this environment can be used to demonstrate, explain and test powerful Gaia-X concepts like:
points: - Sovereign Data Exchange (incl smart contracts, logging and audit trail)
